TopicTitle: (WIP)A million light-years from home THE MISSION PACK!!! Mission 3 Out!

Articles.Content:
Hey guys! i pressent to you the

 

A MILLON LIGHT-YEARS FROM HOME MISSION PACK

It has been a while since i made my first misión called Encounters in the void(small patch coming today).But now i think is time to go BIG-er.

This mission pack will let you live some of the events from my novel wich i suggets that before playing this missions you read it.

So... for now it isnt much of a pack since theres only 2 misión But in time this will be a mission

You will need to install the following mods to use this mission pack:(note that this list will get larger)

 

Heres the first misión:

Mission 1:A corius discovery:Difficulty: Normal

Spoiler

In the early 21 century kerbal kind was corius if there were alone....or is there alien life...For this reason they founded the KETI program.A program wich mission is to find alien life.2 years later they find a mistirius object aproaching kerbin.After it impacted at kerbin.2 kerbals where sended to find were the object crashes
Tips:
After going to the probe ascent as fast as possible to 2500.You will se why...
DOWLOAD HERE:https://kerbalx.com/missions/60

Steam workshop link:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1418114373&searchtext

Known problems:

none

(WIP)Mission 2:Kerbin Interstellar phasegate resuply:DIfficulty:Hard

Spoiler

The kaurora construction is going to plan...but theres 1 problem.They need more materials.Your objective in this mission is to build a vessel.land on the mun or Minmus.Extract ore from it and then deliver it to the KIPG
Tips:
The phasegate is on SUPER HIGHT KERBIN ORBIT.so bring a LOT of fuel.You can even bring an ISRU to refuel when you are landed in a body
Theres an asteroid orbiting from wich you could extract ore from.So if you are felling for a challenge bring the CLAW
You can land at Minmus dont be dumb!

Links:

KerbalX:https://kerbalx.com/missions/70

Steam Workshop:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1433161577

Known problems:

After building your craft you will be sent to control the phasegate.To fix this just go on map view and switch craft to the delivery vessel

The station may wiggle a bit.To fix it just use timewarp

The asteroid wil be used on a later versión of the mission.For now leave the asteroid alone.If you dock with asteroid nothing will happen.

 

Mission 3:Flight training:dificulty:easy

Spoiler

The Kaurora is almost acomplised.After a long time chossing who will be the lucky kerbal that will be the first the land at 4546b and be the first kerbal to land on a world in another solar sistem.Ryley kerman has been selected.
One of the trainning activities he has to do is to take off a small ultralight plane from the island airfield,fly it to the GSC(Galaxi Space Center),Do some manuvers and then land it at the runway.Good luck.
Tips:
This craft can stall really easyly so dont do agresive manuvers.
when you are above the runway just before touching down i recomend you use the chute
When going to the last flight throught node i recomend you accend a little bit.
IMPORTANT
For realisim you need to stay always below 3500 feet.Or Ryley will sufucate!

Links:

KerbalX:https://kerbalx.com/missions/71

Steamworkshop:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1434344664

I HOPE YOU ENJOYED THE FIRST MISSION AND MORE WILL COME IN THE FUTURE....

BEFORE YOU GO IF YOU HAVE ANY IDEAS ON HOW TO IMPROVE THE MISSION OR IDEAS FOR MORE MISSIONS COMMENT BELOW!!!!

ROADMAP:

Spoiler

-Mission ideas:

mission 2:KIPG resuply(In this mission you will have to launch a rocket of your own,land it on the mun or minmus and then dock it with the station)(%90 percent done)

misión 3 :Crew transport(in this mission you will launch an improved versión of the pika 1 and dock it with the spacestation)

mission 4:Marroned on an alien world(you will need to pilot the pika infinity from 4546B to Niebos)

(Maybe):Make a badge for anyone that can land on the asteroid

Improved the already made mission


CREDITS:

KerbalX user:Rocket_man1234: For the aircraft you are going to be using at misión 3

 

Edited July 10, 2018 by KerbolExplorer

Hey guys.I just uploaded the first versión of mission 2 for the mission pack!

I say the first versión because i think i will update son with an extra feature 

 well now to talk about the mission:

In this mission you are going to design a vessel that will go to the mun or to minmus to get some ore.After getting the ore you will go to the  kerbin Interstellar phasegate.Then you will dock with it.

Sounds simple right?Well this mission is acctually quite hard,why? well the phasegate is at the limit of the SOI of kerbin.Sooo yeah good i wish you luck!

On 6/16/2018 at 11:15 PM, KerbolExplorer said:

The kaurora construction is going to plan...

This must be referring to the "Subnautica" if I got it correctly...(and from your portrait image...)

MISSION 3 IS OUT and mission 2 had an update!!

IN mission 3 you are back at Kerbin.This time you are on a training mission.You will use the Wind catcher to fly from the island airfield to the GSC and then do some simple manuvers.

Mission 2 is now 100% done.You can now use that asteroid to mine some ore(good luck rendezvoing with it thought).If you are planning to land on that asteroid make sure to bring A LOT of fuel to rendezvous with the phasegate.. Hope you enjoy the mission!.More are comming soon....Oh and by the way mission 2 is not updated on steam(because i dont know how to)
